channel.title: Go on Tai Vong
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Tai Vong

item.title: Cloud Platform
item.description: Project Overview Developed a cloud-native platform for microservices management Implemented infrastructure as code using Terraform Created a React-based dashboard for monitoring Integrated with AWS services Technical Highlights Used Go for backend services Implemented Kubernetes operators Built CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions Created comprehensive documentation

item.title: Software Engineer
item.description: Role Overview Led development of microservices architecture Implemented CI/CD pipelines Managed cloud infrastructure Mentored junior developers Key Achievements Reduced deployment time by 40% Improved system reliability by 60% Successfully migrated legacy systems to cloud
